item.description:
Hi Everyone.

I am going to my other home to get away for the weekend and since there is some other activity going on in town, its another good reason to go.

I am all dressed up in my PIGG FARMER clothes for this location and my pitchfork is sharpened up to Poke some ass.

 

Weather: http://www.usairnet.com/cgi-bin/launch/code.cgi?Submit=Go&sta=KSFM&state=ME

 

Please check out the info at this link of Hot activities:

http://www.visitogunquit.org/event.php?id=6

 

Note: You will have to arrange your own lodging (ie sharing a room to carpooling..etc)

 

MR MEAT NEEDS A SEXY THIN ATHLETIC GIRLFRIEND TO SHARE A RIDE AND ROOM WITH, INTERESTED ??? You may need Ear Plugs and a dust mask with VIX Vapo Rub on the inside of it.

 

Below is a listing link of some lodging near Perkins Cove / Ogunquit area.

https://www.google.com/search?q=ogunquit+hotels&rlz=1C1CHFX_enUS454US454&aq=f&oq=ogunquit+hotels&sugexp=chrome,mod=14&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8

http://www.cliffhousemaine.com/

------------------------------------------------------------------

I will be in my condo near Perkins cove and the Museum of art and will leave Friday morning for a few stops along the way.

http://www.hillcrestresort.com/

There may be some units available for renting but they are quite expensive from my perspective, i think its better at a local hotel ???

 

Dinner at Warren Buffet..

http://www.lobsterhouse.com/

 

Dinner at The BIG Kahuna Steak House: No Fatty Butt Parts served.

http://www.the-steakhouse.com/

 

Regular Calm Evening Entertainment: (This is the place i go to)

http://maxwellspub.com/

 

Special "Nuts to Butts" all the time Bumping and Deep Hot Grinding: (This is the place i am called FRESH VIRGIN MEAT and i get to sing, "Can't Touch This")

http://www.mainestreetogunquit.com/homepage.html

 

 

Outside Excersize:

 

http://www.agamenticus.org/recreation.html Hiking

 

http://www.fws.gov/northeast/rachelcarson/ Hiking

 

http://marginalwayfund.org/ walking

 

More Details as necessary..

 

al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Talk to me at the event prior to this one. (Cold Springs River)

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
